data.title: Good Hotel to stay
data.text:
Looks older the carpet and walls on the  corridor  but nice and clean room and confortable bed.
Excellent service from the ladies at the lobby.............
Not extraordinary breakfast but included on your stay.

data.title: Stranded in Chicago with a great place to overnight
data.text: I missed my connection in Chicago and the next plane wasn't until early morning the next day. It was late and I didn't want to sleep at the airport as I had just spent 15+ hours on the airplane from Shanghai to Chicago due to weather and delays. Best Western in Des Plaines was an ideal choice to overnight since they had a 24-hour shuttle that could take me back to the airport at 3:00 am. Kudos to such a great staff.

data.title: A Quiet Place to Sleep
data.text: I was attending a dinner function nearby, and I didn't want to drive back home for the over an hour trip. I checked in quickly in the afternoon and went up to my room to change for the dinner. The room was clean, and had a  medium sized refrigerator, coffee pot, free wi-fi and a great flat screened TV. After I returned after 11:30pm, I slept peacefully and woke up the next morning and made myself a cup of coffee. The room and hotel certainly did not disappoint. Now this is a hotel, with rooms inside, and an elevator. It has an exercise room and a pool. It's not a three star hotel, but it certainly met my needs for a place to sleep.

data.title: pleasure
data.text: The hotel is a very nice place. It felt very like at home.The staff was very accommodating especially manager Selma that is there most of the times we reserve our rooms.The breakfast is very tasty as their is many options to choose from.We always stay here for family plans.

owner_response.author: manojmahapatra, General Manager at BEST WESTERN Des Plaines Inn, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,

It is our pleasure to have been able to accommodate you and your family. We are glad you enjoyed the varieties we provide at breakfast. We hope to see you again for another family reunion.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: work
data.text: I come here for work regularly. The hotel staff is exceptionally helpful, friendly and extremely courteous. I wish all of the Best Western hotels were at this standard of customer service. This is by far one of the best hotels that i stay at and should be treated as model as to how a hotel should be operated. The front desk manager goes above and beyond the call of duty to take care of my and my coworkers needs.

owner_response.author: manojmahapatra, General Manager at BEST WESTERN Des Plaines Inn, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,

I would like to thank you for such positive feedback. We are glad to hear that you consider us a role model property for the Best Western chain. I will inform our wonderful staff of the customer service compliments you have provided.We hope to see you again soon.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Very nice!
data.text: I stay here quite often. The hotel staff is very nice and breakfast is great. nice little workout room, and very nice pool. The hotel is in a great location with plenty to eat that's within walking distance. They also offer a hotel shuttle to get to the airport at no cost to you. Thank you to the best Western staff for making my stay enjoyable away from home!

owner_response.author: manojmahapatra, General Manager at BEST WESTERN Des Plaines Inn, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,

Thank you for considering our property ""home away from home" it means a lot to us. We are pleased to hear so much positive feedback. We hope to see you in the near future for another pleasant experience here at the Best Western Des Plaines.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Business trip
data.text: Breakfast is hot and up to standards.Selma always accommodates our group of guys.we always chose this hotel because it's close to everything.The pool is remodeled and they did lot of remodeling for rooms.

owner_response.author: manojmahapatra, General Manager at BEST WESTERN Des Plaines Inn, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,

Thank you for always being a returning customer and we enjoy seeing you here at the Best Western Des Plaines. We are glad you recognize all the remodeling projects we are doing to improve our hotel and we are pleased to hear you enjoy our hot delicious breakfast. I hope to see you soon again.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great place to stay.
data.text: We stayed here for one night on an overnight layover. It was very clean and comfortable. The only minor complaints are that the eggs weren't that great at breakfast and there was not half & half for the coffee, and we also felt the instructions for where to find the shuttle at the airport were kind of confusing. But overall it was a great experience and I would definitely recommend staying here.

owner_response.author: manojmahapatra, General Manager at BEST WESTERN Des Plaines Inn, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,

We are very pleased you chose to stay at our property while your flight had a layover. We are sorry you did not enjoy our eggs at breakfast time.Our scrambled eggs are always fresh made without liquid preservatives. We hope to see you again in the near future.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Typical
data.text:
I was in town for a trade show, and having enough points for a free room, it seemed like a no brainer.

The lobby is fairly OK. Nothing special. The breakfast area looks interesting, in a good way. I will not be sure until tomorrow morning. 

There are 3 floors with an elevator. There is also a long (50') pool that appears very clean, and of course I forgot my bathing suit. #$%%&@#.

The room was fairly decent in size. Probably a little roomier than the average. From what I can tell, there are no real issues. Plenty of plug ins in the room which is important these days. Gotta plug in the two phones, pad, and disco ball. 

As far as noise, I won't be certain until the wee hours of the morning. At this moment, the mini fridge seems to making its share of racket. Also, there is a auto detailing (or something) across the alley with the occasional air compressor running. I figure that will stop pretty early. At least it is not by a freeway, but there is city traffic, which should also peter out with the passage of time.

There is no need to worry about the pressure in the shower knocking you over. They have considered the safety aspects of the shower, and it safely comes out at a fast dribble, but not so fast as to cause injury.

There are a number of eating establishments within just a couple of minute walk. One that I can recommend is the Silver Stallion, but there are others. The majority of which are taco oriented. 

I would probably have given this facility a rating of three and a half to three and three quarters, but that is not allowed, hence the three star.

data.title: Good Airport Hotel with Pleasant Staff
data.text: My wife and I just stayed the one night at the Best Western Des Plaines Inn following traveling to Chicago. The rooms were adequate and the staff were very pleasant. The shuttle bus was out of service when we arrived but one phone call and the hotel booked us a taxi direct from the airport and paid the bill without problem. All in all a good stay with comfortable bed and a reasonable breakfast.

owner_response.author: manojmahapatra, General Manager at BEST WESTERN Des Plaines Inn, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,

We apologize the shuttle bus was out of service but we are glad you were satisfied with our back up shuttle service we provided you. We hope to see you again in the near future.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Terrible customer service
data.text:
First things first, the free continental breakfast was great considering me and my friends are broke college kids on a breakaway road trip, and also considering Chicago isn't the cheapest of places. However, that's probably the only good to come out of it. To begin with, the check-in process was obnoxious as the hotel clerk didn't recgonize my reservation at first (I booked through hotwire). Show him the reciept and was able to give me a room, only after giving a fee for having 4 guests, which was already included in the hotwire payment. Then, charge me twice and so I had to come down and speak with him again and not only did he not accept my request for a refund, he belittled me for being a "kid". At that point I was 20, and my friend who was with me was 21 so perfectly able to make the reservation. After the next two days of talking to management, they assured me the second charge would be corrected in the upcoming business days. It never did. It wasn't until months later (maybe up to 4 months?) and repeated calls going nowhere. Every time I called the management staff would ignore my request and blamed me for my own problems.
Enough of that though, the room was fine, clean, and in working condition. Especially for $40 a night split between 3 other people. Location was conveniently close to some good shopping centers and restaurants and also the metro station. Would not recommend soley based off of the customer service I had. Would recommend the room if you want a cheap place to stay outside of Chicago.

owner_response.author: manojmahapatra, General Manager at BEST WESTERN Des Plaines Inn, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,

We are very sorry you didn't have a nice experience here at the Best Western Des Plaines hotel. The hotel policy is after two people there is an additional charge of $10 per day for any extra guests that are adults.We experience sometimes miscommunication when guests book through a third party company because we are not the ones explaining you the cancellation policy,room capacity,extra charges, and so on. If you ever decide to give us a second try I will personally make sure your stay is satisfied and you can call me direct for a reservation.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Hot Tub Room
data.text: I picked this room because it was the lowest cost with an in room hot tub.  It was near our goal in Chicago.  Breakfast was good, the usual stuff.  Some parking spaces were under roof and lighted which felt good due to truck with stuff in the back.  Nice place, normal hotel otherwise.

owner_response.author: manojmahapatra, General Manager at BEST WESTERN Des Plaines Inn, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,

Thank you for choosing to stay at the Best Western Des Plaines Inn. We are glad you enjoyed our newly changed hot tubs in the Jacuzzi rooms. We hope to see you in the future again.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Nice Motel in the heart of business district
data.text:
Got a room at the last minute as my bus was being repaired overnight.
Dest clerk was very good and gave a recommendation for a great place to eat within walking distance. It was only two doors down.  Room was clean and comfortable. Breakfast includes fresh home made scrambled eggs. not the usual microwave stuff.
I recommend this property when you are in the area.

owner_response.author: manojmahapatra, General Manager at BEST WESTERN Des Plaines Inn, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,
Thank you for your positive feedback.We are glad you picked our property to stay in this kind of time of need as your bus was being fixed. We hope to see you again.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Surprised
data.text: Quite a change compared to the big hotels around the area. Nice pool, not expensive and free parking. Rooms are clean and staff very welcoming! I would stay here anytime. Lots of restruants in area also. Nothing to break the bank.

owner_response.author: manojmahapatra, General Manager at BEST WESTERN Des Plaines Inn, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,

Thank you for staying with us at the Best Western Des Plaines. We are glad you enjoyed the amenities and the convenience of the location which is near many restaurants. We hope to see you again in the near future.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Relinquish the "Best Western" brand
data.text: The first impression we got from this hotel was that it was very much outdated. Wrinkled curtains, dirty floor, elevator smelled like old greased motors. The floor seems as if has not been waxed in decades. When we checked in our room the carpet was completely damp and made our feet wet. We had to place all our belongings off the floor. Bed sheets were old however they were clean. The shower was very old and no complimentary soaps just a dispenser with soaps. If we had not been so exhausted from our drive from Minnesota or worse with our children we would've checked out immediately. Just glad we were only there to sleep a couple of hours. We didn't even eat the breakfast just in a hurry to check out and be on our way to the airport.

owner_response.author: manojmahapatra, General Manager at BEST WESTERN Des Plaines Inn, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,

We are very sorry your experience was not up to expectation. We strive to make positive improvements everyday. We do inspections for the rooms regularly and I will make sure all of the issues you brought to my attention are looked into closely.The property is very up to date with decor and we have done many renovations, so we are disappointed you felt it was outdated.We hope you will give us a second chance to make your stay a much more pleasant experience.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Dont Stay Here
data.text: Terrible service. Staff is rude and on the take for over priced shuttle rides, etc. Noisy and dirty room. Very slow internet. I complained of noise that kept me up all night but they would not comp my room for that night. Did move me to the top floor and the noise was much less.

owner_response.author: manojmahapatra, General Manager at BEST WESTERN Des Plaines Inn, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,

I sincerely apologize for the unsatisfying experience you had at our property. I will speak to my staff and figure out what could have went wrong for the customer service and housekeeping departments to have not been up to standard. As for the noise level unfortunately we don't have control over what the other guests do in their rooms but the fact that they moved you shows the staff member took the appropriate measures to warn the guest and move you so it doesn't happen again.I hope you will give us a second chance to serve you better in the near future.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: One Night Stop on Road Trip - Very Pleased
data.text:
We stopped at this hotel without a reservation on our road trip.

Michael checked us in. He was very pleasant and offered many suggestions for dinner.

The hotel was very clean. There was a worker cleaning the floor in the evening. The room was large and inviting with a microwave and fridge.

The pool was very clean. 

The breakfast area was quite large and very clean. They had the normal Best Western breakfast. The woman who handled the breakfast was very accommodating. 

I would definitely stay here again.

owner_response.author: manojmahapatra, General Manager at BEST WESTERN Des Plaines Inn, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,

We appreciate the wonderful feedback.We are glad you picked our property to stay at as you were passing by on your road trip. We hope to see you again in the future.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great park and fly accommodations
data.text: We stayed 1 night prior to going on vacation.  our flight left very early the next morning, so the breakfast room attendant prepared us a "to go" bag with some danish, fruit and also we had some coffee.  They shuttled us to the airport and we left our vehicle in their safe parking lot for 10 days, for FREE.  Upon our return from our trip, they picked us up at the airport about midnight and we stayed at this hotel for an additional 2 nights for an event we were invited to in Chicago.  The breakfasts were very good and hot.  Coffee was a little weak, but we like ours dark.  The pool is nice and there is also covered parking available on a first come basis.  The room was very nice and the bed was very comfortable.  It is very quiet also.

owner_response.author: manojmahapatra, General Manager at BEST WESTERN Des Plaines Inn, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,

We are very pleased to hear about your recent stay. We are glad you took advantage of our park and fly program and our grab and go breakfast for the guests that have to depart before breakfast hours.We hope to see you again in the near future.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great location, good value
data.text:
The location is great, close to Chicago O'Hare, but also close to a nice shopping mall with Woodfield Mall, there's a Taco Bell around the corner, which clinched the deal for me. But also there is a Metra station close by to go downtown or a bus to Skokie that gets you to Wrigley Field.

The hotel is clean, has breakfast, pool, gym, good house-keeping and the price is very good for the location. I would definitely recommend this hotel to anyone.

owner_response.author: manojmahapatra, General Manager at BEST WESTERN Des Plaines Inn, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,

Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. I am very happy to hear such positive feedback about your recent stay. We hope to see you again soon.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: 2.5 rating - I'd look elsewhere if I booked near ORD again.
data.text:
I chose this hotel because Best Westerns usually provide a higher level of service & offer a great breakfast for an affordable price, also I needed a quick overnight hotel when I didn't make it through ORD customs & TSA in time for my connecting flight. If I could choose again, I'd probably stay somewhere else. 

Here are a few reasons: 
-The linens, carpet & shower curtain were very worn & tattered. Time for replacement on all. 
-My rotary dial phone in my room was not even connected to a phone line. I pulled out the furniture to try to find the cord but it wasn't there. Safety issue much? 
-Breakfast was average but not the usual Best Western spread I've come to know & love. Eggs were the only meat/protein product on the bar. Of the two waffle makers, 1 was broken & the other was partially broken-no alert to notify you when your breakfast was fully cooked. 
-The hotel advertises a shuttle service, but no driver is on duty so they hire out private taxis-odd, but effective. Seems like it would be expensive for the management. 
-The body care dispensers in the shower were not appropriate for the products being dispensed. After about 5 minutes of pumping the hair products, I gave up & dug in my luggage for something I had on me while dripping wet. Side note: I do appreciate the hotel's earth friendly approach to eliminate little sample size bottle waste, wished the dispensers worked.

Beds & room were comfortable though-heat worked, sheets were clean but there was no comforter-found that odd. Just sheets & a blanket. Overall, it was a mediocre stay.

owner_response.author: manojmahapatra, General Manager at BEST WESTERN Des Plaines Inn, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,

I apologize you did not have a satisfactory experience at our property.We are open to feedback and making positive changes at all times. I will start by saying our carpet was replaced one year ago for all rooms. I will make sure the staff checks that all phone lines are plugged in correctly and in working condition.The machine for the waffles and pancakes are brand new and maybe at the time of your stay had to be serviced due to a problem.We have our own shuttle van and drivers but if the shuttle is not present at the property we use the taxi company to accommodate our guests so they don't experience a long wait time or to risk being late for their flights.I will have maintenance check all of the shower dispensers to make sure they are working correctly.The comforters are always in the closet of the guests room in case they get cold. We hope you will give us a second chance to serve you better.
owner_response.title: Owner Response
